info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 3:13PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila and Maricopa Counties through 400 PM MST... At 312 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sunflower, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Round Valley, Sycamore Creek, Sunflower, Ballantine Trailhead and Rio Verde. This includes AZ Route 87 between mile markers 207 and 226. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
